content:
Hi, I'm trying to use cargo docs to only build doc for my library ($ cargo doc --open --lib --no-deps) but it doesnt work as expected (I get documentation for all dependencies).

I've found this issue cargo#2025 which points to a more general tracking issue rust-lang#8296.

Am I correct that this is not yet available, right?
--no-deps should only build for your library
Did you run without --no-deps in the past? Rustdoc will use the cached docs from then if so
ahh nice catch! I've deleted ./target/doc and rerun the command. Now I only see my crate. thanks :-)
